name: fast-data-engine
description: Fast Data Engine is a blazing fast data grouping and filtering engine.

scripts.build: run-s clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:js && npm run build:copy-types
scripts.prepare:generate-changelog: auto-changelog -p --ignore-commit-pattern "update changelog, fix linting, regenerate barrels"
scripts.prepare:commit-changes: git add --all && git commit -m "chore(release): update changelog, fix linting, regenerate barrels"
scripts.release-prerelease: npm run check && npm version prerelease && npm run release:prepare-release && npm run release:release-to-github && npm run release:release-to-npm
scripts.release-patch: npm run check && npm version patch && npm run release:prepare-release && npm run release:release-to-github && npm run release:release-to-npm
scripts.release-minor: npm run check && npm version minor && npm run release:prepare-release && npm run release:release-to-github && npm run release:release-to-npm
scripts.release-major: npm run check && npm version major && npm run release:prepare-release && npm run release:release-to-github && npm run release:release-to-npm

scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.test: Lint and unit test the project
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Rebuild, run tests, then create and open the coverage report
scripts-info.doc: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.doc:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.version: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.prepare-release: One-step: clean, build, test, publish docs, and prep a release
